name: Always on TIME
description:
Get your beat on with 'Always in Time', the rhythm-based puzzle game where you control trains and send them safely to their destinations at various beats per minute. With increasing levels of complexity as tracks overlap, challenge your coordination and problem-solving skills in this musical journey.

Game created in 72 hour for "Minijam 125 : Signal."
The limitation was  "Everything is tied to the rhythm"

Controls:
Just simple Left mouse clicks!

--

"Floating Cities" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
